email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope you're doing well.

We are pleased to offer the vessel SEA HORIZON for your 12,500MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 42 per metric ton.

The SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 20-25 October. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. We are looking to secure a competitive rate for this shipment.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering our long-standing relationship, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 15,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of USD 40 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-20 and end on 2023-10-25. We can offer a laytime of 4 days with the demurrage rate of USD 15,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers
